(:50) (Shotgun) 9-D.Brees pass short left to 12-M.Colston to CLV 22 for 4 yards (21-E.Wright). FUMBLES (21-E.Wright), and recovers at CLV 23. 12-M.Colston to CLV 23 for no gain (21-E.Wright). After the play, the Saints attempted to rush a field goal attempt, as Cleveland through the CHALLENGE flag, asserting that Colston FUMBLED and the ball was recovered by Cleveland. This challenge was DENIED, as the play was not reviewable. After the third quarter ended, the Saints then challenged the ruling that Colston was down by contact. New Orleans challenged the fumble ruling, and the play was REVERSED. (Shotgun) 9-D.Brees pass short left to 12-M.Colston to CLV 21 for 5 yards (21-E.Wright). After the play, the Saints attempted to rush a field goal attempt, as Cleveland through the CHALLENGE flag, asserting that Colston FUMBLED and the ball was recovered by Cleveland. This challenge was DENIED, as the play was not reviewable. After the third quarter ended, the Saints then challenged the ruling that Colston was down by contact. The overturn on review negated the fumble.
